general_questions: How many federal states does Germany have?
How many minutes are in one hour?
How many players are currently in this round?
How many cards are in a standard deck?
nhie_questions: Never have I ever stolen something.
Never have I ever cheated in an exam.
Never have I ever ghosted someone.
Never have I ever forgotten my birthday.
Never have I ever secretly drunk something I shouldn't have.
card_ace_desc: Everyone drinks until the person to your left stops. You begin.
card_2_desc: Distribute a total of 2 sips to any players.
card_4_desc: Ask a question. Anyone who is wrong drinks.
card_5_desc: Choose a category. Go around. Whoever fails drinks.
card_7_desc: Hands up! The last one drinks.
card_8_desc: Choose a drinking buddy. They drink with you until the next 8.
card_9_desc: Start with a word. Everyone must rhyme. Whoever fails drinks.
card_jack_desc: Create a new rule that applies from now on.
card_queen_desc: Say something you've never done. Anyone who has must drink.
card_king_desc: Pour a sip into the cup. Whoever draws the 4th King drinks it.
